title: Review
review: Very limited rides, very rude staff , filthy water , got skin allergy after the visit, don't feel like going again.

title: Big Area with so many Slides
review: It was great to be here. It really made my day and the time spent here was really awesome. Affordable Too.

title: Amazing...
review: After visiting Ajmer city we want some refreshment so we went here. We mostly enjoyed rain dance. Just great experience.

title: Summer attraction
review: Birla city water park was good attractions of summer season. Good water park with nice cleaning. Ride experience was amazing.

title: Amazing Experience
review: Birla City Water Park, an amazing place to go in summer. The best part is the park is well managed and clean. Amazing ride that I have ever experienced. Music and food are awesome. And very nice place for spending an amazing time.

title: Sunday outing
review: Smaller pool than expected with a huge turnout of visitors. Highly unhygienic and dirty water. Rides are also not maintained. No proper arrangement for girls or even for boys.

title: Bad Sunday
review: There is very dirty water and rides also not clean and I cannot enjoy there  are not right things for girls

title: Birla made the day
review: Birla is an amazing place which is actually in your budget. You read that right. According to my experience, i have visited all the major water parks in rajasthan but birla outshined all of them. We went there during a weekday and the entry cost for a person was ₹400 and on weekends it is 500 but the experience we had there was amazing.. They have amazing slides, thundering rain dance, super amazing wavepool and surprisingly swimming pool was 8 feet deep. To my shock park had 6-7 german shepherd dogs and they were causing no harm to anyone, they were so quiet and amazing.

title: Superb
review: This water park situated in Ajmer near makhupura circle. The best part is the park is well managed and clean. We Love this Place.

title: Summer mae tau jaana Banta hae
review: Birla city water park has lot to offer- Be it all the slides & rides Bathing and attractive Rain Dance on Music Lunch & Dinner Parties

title: Awesome place
review: Enjoy very much nice place for summer so cold water m I get refresh In hot weather

title: Too crowded
review: A waterpark is a great place to be in summers but as most water parks when its crowded its best avaiodable.

title: Lot of Fun
review: We come here with three family with children. We enjoy here 4 hours and children not to want leave form Water Park. Here lot of fan available

title: amazing water park
review: i had visited this water park on nearby times with my family. such a lovely place to have near me. must visit.

title: Fun on Picnic
review: I am visited here with family and we enjoy all type of rides. At last we enjoy is swimming pool with my kids till they tired.

title: Nice
review: Pool's are clean but have to focus on other things like side area toilets

title: Fun time
review: Birla city water park is nice water park.good place.we can do lots of fun there.my experience of of this park is good.

title: Birla city water park is nice water park.good place.we can do lots of fun there.my experience of of this park is good.
review: Uttam garg beawer full enjoy mast and me my friend full enjoy my famaliy full enjoy and staf good and

title: Fun
review: Birla city water park is fantastic place for entertainment. Good place for family. My experience of its is good.

title: Water boom..
review: Enjoyed by summer day here. the place is really good and less crowddy. hope these place will make more rides to enjoy..

title: Nice to spend time.
review: If you have nothing to do in Ajmer this is the best place to be... More of if you visit in summer this is the best place to kill the souring heat.

title: Great place for hangout
review: I am a water park lover. This place is quite awsm. I have been here 6 times at least. This water park is good but fee is somewhat high. This is located near ajmer on highway. You can reach there by bus or by personal Vehicle.

title: Good place
review: Its one of the better water parks in Rajasthan. There are enough things to keep you excited for a full day. Food always taste good once you come out of water!!

title: "Good place to enjoy with family"
review: Very good place to enjoy with family and friends,nice rides,clean water...costumes also available at reasonable price.

title: Trip with in laws
review: Was impressed with this water park. Quite a few rides in a nice location. Clean water. Swim suits available at nominal charglo Male Female Changing room available with lockers. Dj playing the music. Restaurant serving  tasty Indian fast food. Overall a good place to visit.

title: Cool Place
review: Out side of ajmer this water park is one good place to spend few hours with family in water sports .

title: Its great fun with family..
review: Its a best place for fun specially with family and friends. Birla City water park's team organized various programs to attract the visitors and they recently made wonderland for kinds and adults . The mini wonderland has various swings and awesome toys which itself a fun.. Every adult convert into a kid when enters here. Only problem is little high content of chlorine present in water which makes skin rough, dry and little blemished.. Rest all things are fabulous including the rooms and food... Yummie...

title: With Family Enjoy here
review: a very good place to enjoy with family, friends, very clean water, co operative staff, affordable price, fun,  adventure, rain dance and many more thing; i love this place.

title: Not worth visiting
review: Overall experience only average..It isn't the best waterpark or something like that... if the crowd is much then you will have to need a shower 'coz the regular water filtration of pools is not done and therefore after some time you could see the water becoming more and more dirty. Eatables are sold at a higher price than the MRP and not much choice available for selection. Unsatisfactory service rendered.

title: Nice Place to spend a Summer day.
review: This water park situated in Ajmer near makhupura circle. If you are in train leave the train at Adarsh Nagar Railway Station or hire a taxi/ Auto from Ajmer Railway Station. Its a average water park with 400/- entry fees for adults and 300/- for childrens.

title: Great fun
review: Best place to visit in ajmer with family,clean water, nice costume with some money,overall good place for entertainment.

title: Chill out place
review: The place to chill out in hot summer days. Too far from the city is the only major disadvantage of the place.
